Headline: #24 Wentworth Temporary Reroute at Wentworth/69th
ShortDescription: 24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Wentworth, 71st, Stewart, 69th and Wentworth due to street blockage near Wentworth/69th.

How does this affect my trip?

#24 Wentworth buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Wentworth, 71st, Stewart, 69th and Wentworth due to street blockage near Wentworth/69th.
